title: Textile, "Ditto", 1952
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: screen printed on plain weave
markings:
Printed on right edge: "DITTO" BY ERIK NITSCHI,  PATT REP 17 1/2"
Printed on left edge: L.ANTON MAIX FABRICS NYC  -- KALEIDOSCOPEIC PRINTS, REG 1952
dimensions: Warp x Weft (cut top & bottom; selvedge to selvedge): 290 x 131 cm (9 ft. 6 3/16 in. x 51 9/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of L. Anton Maix, Inc.
description: Broad horizontal bands shading from black to white and back, achieved by artful arrangement of oval dots of varying sizes. Printed in black on white sheer cotton.
